"So what would that be? Sheila's condo, my small mansion, or would you like to be the sole resident of the studio?" She asked.

Peter thought for a few moments.
1211112.title: Peter is too tired to go and decides to rest

choices: He goes to the shower with Sabrina
He tries to play it cool for the "audition"
14.content:
Peter saw a skunk standing next to him. She had black fur, white fur in some places, and was wearing a blue t-shirt and a pair of glasses. She was also wearing a pair of pants that matched her fur pattern, though Peter assumed she didn't have any pants on at all.

"Are you here for the audition?" she asked "Cause you look a little young. Unless the boss is trying something new.". She leaned in closer, allowing Peter to get a better look at her. "So what's your name?" the skunk asked. "P-Peter." he stuttered. "Well, I'm Sabrina Skunk." she said, giving Peter a peck on the cheek. "We'd better get you out of these clothes." Sabrina said "And you look like you could use a shower.". Peter wasn't sure what to do at this point. What happens next?
14.title: Sabrina Skunk

15.content:
Who else could it be?

(for Readers Choice please pick a charcter and go with a story)
15.title: someone else

choices: Little Timmy gets a fun Babysitter

155.title: Alternative story

Perhabs a diffetent setting...
(please start with a prepared concept. Don't make a character creation tree, etc..)
1553.title: A Different Scenario

info.brief_description: A teen fox accidentally ends up in the ZZ Studio.
info.description:
You follow Peter, a 14 year old fox boy orphan, who lives on the street and hides from the authorities. As luck has it he one day runs into the back of the most popular adult furry studio in the country. There he gets the attention of some of the most attractive ladies working there. Peters puberty is going to have a major kick start.

Some of the rules:
- Please add at least several lines of story at a time (no one liners).
- Try to use mostly characters involved with ZZ Studio (from Eric Schwartz and Max Blackrabbit and so on) see www.furafterdark.com for references
- ABSOLUTELY NO vore, gore, scat, watersporst, supernatural, size changing, fat, violence, gas or anything gross and disturbing.
- No gay stuff (can be MMF, but no MM involvement)
- Be creative and try to create some kind of a plot
info.pretty_title: A boy at the ZZ Studio
